summary: Left for dead after a bear attack, a fur-trapper recuperates and pursues his former companions through dangerous Indian territory.
cast: Richard Harris|John Huston|Henry Wilcoxon|Percy Herbert|Dennis Waterman|Prunella Ransome|Sheila Raynor|Norman Rossington|James Doohan|Bryan Marshall|Ben Carruthers|Robert Russell|John Bindon|Bruce M. Fischer|Dean Selmier|Manolo Landau|William Layton|Judith Furse|Rudy Althoff|Peggy The Bear|Ines Acosta|Raul Castro|Tony Cyrus|Tamara Sie|Joaquín Solís|Martha Tuck
title: El hombre de una tierra salvaje
